Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(infra\): add S3 bucket for long-term audit log storage

Add compliance-ready S3 bucket for storing all email audit logs:

Storage Architecture:
- S3 bucket with versioning enabled for data protection
- Block all public access + enforce SSL for security
- S3-managed encryption at rest

Lifecycle Policies \(Cost Optimization\):
- 0-30 days: S3 Standard \(hot storage\)
- 30-365 days: S3 Infrequent Access \(warm storage\)
- 1-7 years: S3 Glacier \(cold archive\)
- After 7 years: Auto-delete \(adjustable per compliance needs\)

Lambda Permissions:
- SendEmailLambda, VerifyEmailLambda, ProcessFeedbackLambda,
  LeadImportLambda: write access to store audit logs
- ApiLeadsLambda: read access for audit trail queries

Environment Variables:
- S3_AUDIT_LOGS_BUCKET added to all Lambda functions
- DYNAMODB_TABLE_LOGS added for LogsTable reference

Log Contents \(per email\):
- resolvedSubject, resolvedBody \(exact content sent\)
- templateVariables \(recipient email, name, company\)
- leadId, campaignId, sesResponse, timestamp

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
